name: Roverally v2018-03
description:
Generate stunt rally tracks randomly and pilot your rover against 3 CPUs.

Last changes: Mission modes 2P and 5 templates for 1P; CPU will bump you for good; balustrades removed to avoid some blocks of the CPU rovers; added "falling down" and other sounds.

***ITA***

Per giocare serve esclusivamente la versione 1.4.217 di Kodu, vedi
tito76.itch.io

*********

To play you need exclusively the v1.4.217 of Kodu, see
tito76.itch.io

Tracks
------
Random land generation:
Select the icon named "Roughen";
Enlarge the brush size to cover all the track;
Use the "Hilly" effect, then "Smooth".
